titleStmt.title: An answer to a prnted pamphlet called the case of the inhabitants of Croydon in the county of Surrey, humbly offered to the Parliaments judicious consideration.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The case of the inhabitants of the town and parish of Croyden in the county of Surrey.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
